pr_title: SIRI-286 Sanitize paths in the storage engine

timeline.message:
Add a utility function to sanitize paths

The old method (copied from the old framework) was marked as deprecated,
as it isn't used anywhere.

Fixes: SIRI-286

Sanitize the paths in the blob storage space

This also makes the method ensureRelativePath redundant as the sanitized
paths are stripped of leading slashes already.

Fixes: SIRI-286

Sanitize the paths in the virtual file system

This also makes the method ensureRelativePath redundant as the sanitized
paths are stripped of leading slashes already.

Fixes: SIRI-286

Ensure that newly created blobs are cached

Fixes: SIRI-286

timeline.bodyText: I think this call has to be added to Blob::updateContent as well as we could otherwise overwrite a sanitized path with an unsanitized one by accident when updating the content of a blob and passing a file name
timeline.author: sabieber

replies.bodyText: updateContent only updates the file name. The only way to "unsanitize" the path is to pass an invalid file name, which is a separate problem?
replies.author: jmuscireum

replies.bodyText:
Yes thats exactly the problem, which when done will kill most parts of the storage system (vfs roots cant list any files of a space containing a single file with broken filename anymore)
We at least should create a ticket, my thought was that its at least related to the path sanitization (as the name seems to be created from the sanitized path in most cases, only the updateContent method somehow bypasses this logic.
replies.author: sabieber

replies.bodyText: The ticket SIRI-251 should cover this
replies.author: jmuscireum

timeline.author: qw3ry

replies.bodyText: replace already replaces each occurrence. The only difference is that replaceAll expects a regex pattern.

timeline.bodyText: wasn't this put here intentionally as removed is distributed over the intercom and put isn't? @idlira
timeline.author: andyHa

timeline.message:
Invalidate the old cache entry again before adding the new one

This is required as we need to invalidate the entry on all nodes. The
put is only executed on the current node. Also this time we add a
comment so it's not removed again.

Fixes: SIRI-286
